QuestData.Title: Competing Company
QuestData.Description:
Bah! We will learn nothing from the slaughter of laborers.
Seek out their leaders. One of them will know what we need.
Oh, and $n. Listen to them before you kill them this time. You may learn something useful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather information about the Sundered Flame.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Adenedal near the top of the ruins.
QuestData.RewardText: I have seen a sickness like this once before in my life. I had hoped to never see it again.
